vehicles.description: A dark-colored sedan is driving in the same direction ahead of the ego car, positioned in the center of the travel lane
vehicles.explanation: This vehicle dictates the following distance and speed for the ego car to ensure safe driving conditions.

vehicles.description: An orange utility truck parked on the right side of the road, partly on the sidewalk
vehicles.explanation: The stationary position of the truck indicates that it is not an immediate hazard, but it could obscure pedestrians or workers who may enter the road.

vulnerable_road_users.description: Workers are visible on the right side of the road, within a construction area and behind barriers
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: The proximity of the workers to the road could require the ego car to reduce speed or alter its path to ensure their safety.

traffic signs.description: Directional signs on the right, indicating a bend ahead and additional pointing towards different directions
traffic signs.explanation: These signs inform the ego car of upcoming changes in road direction and possible lane merging or diverging, requiring attentive steering and speed adjustments.

traffic cones.description: Traffic cones and barriers are observed on the right side of the road as part of the construction zone
traffic cones.explanation: These objects demarcate the construction area and may indicate a narrowing of the available travel lanes or other hazards that require the ego car to proceed with caution.

barriers.description: Green construction barriers are present on the right side, separating the road from the construction zone
barriers.explanation: These barriers may obscure the view of the road ahead and necessitate a cautious approach by the ego car.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic image, a dark-colored sedan is driving in the same direction ahead of the ego car, positioned in the center of the travel lane. This vehicle dictates the following distance and speed for the ego car to ensure safe driving conditions. Additionally, an orange utility truck is parked on the right side of the road, partly on the sidewalk. The stationary position of the truck indicates that it is not an immediate hazard, but it could obscure pedestrians or workers who may enter the road.

Visible on the right side of the road, workers are present within a construction area behind barriers. The proximity of the workers to the road could require the ego car to reduce speed or alter its path to ensure their safety.

Directional signs on the right indicate a bend ahead and additional pointing towards different directions. These signs inform the ego car of upcoming changes in road direction and possible lane merging or diverging, requiring attentive steering and speed adjustments.

Traffic cones and barriers are observed on the right side of the road as part of the construction zone. These objects demarcate the construction area and may indicate a narrowing of the available travel lanes or other hazards that require the ego car to proceed with caution.

Green construction barriers are present on the right side, separating the road from the construction zone. These barriers may obscure the view of the road ahead and necessitate a cautious approach by the ego car.

1.description and explanation: A traffic sign displaying permitted driving directions shows a right turn and straight ahead are allowed, indicating the ego car must follow one of these options. This sign helps to guide the driver safely through the intersection or road segment ahead.

2.description and explanation: Debris in the road likely from nearby construction activities presents a potential hazard. The ego car must navigate carefully, possibly by reducing speed and ensuring a safe distance to avoid any fragments or obstacles on the road surface.

driving_suggestion: The ego car should maintain a safe distance behind the sedan ahead, adjusting speed as necessary to correspond with the traffic flow. Caution should be taken when approaching the construction area; slowing down is advisable due to workers' proximity to the road and potential obscured hazards. Additionally, the ego car should be prepared to navigate the road's uneven surface and keep an eye out for any directional changes indicated by the road signs.
